data.title: Sidney Toler
data.meta_description:
Sidney Toler was born on April 28, 1874, in Warrensburg, Missouri, USA. He was born Hooper G. Toler Jr., and later changed his name to Sidney Toler when he entered the entertainment industry. Toler was an American actor, playwright, and theatre director, best known for his portrayal of the Chinese-American detective Charlie Chan in 22 films made between 1938 and 1946. 

Before becoming Chan, Toler...
